body: This enchanted iron pot can produce nourishing, simple fare sufficient to feed up to 36 people per day upon command. Once per week it can also be commanded to create a heroes' feast for up to 12 people. The cauldron needs neither fire nor ingredients to produce food; it does so instantly upon command.
name: Cauldron of Plenty
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Cauldron of Plenty
